attributes.action: Make mask wearing outside at all times and in all enclosed areas mandatory
attributes.additional_details: If the Government truly cares about it’s people and our wonderful NHS it should make mask wearing mandatory in all areas outside as well as all enclosed areas.
attributes.background: More and more people are testing positive for Covid19 due to the new variant which is 50-70% more easily transmissible. Making mask wearing mandatory outside at all times and in every enclosed area will help prevent the spread of covid.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554917
